spanGrp.span: I know Russian language from school.
ee urus dili bän bülerım ee školadan
HESIT Russian language -POSS.3 1.SG know -AOR -1.SG HESIT school -ABL
I am learning this language since the first grade.
aa birınji klasstan aa bän bu dili aa učit ederım
HESIT first grade -ABL HESIT 1.SG this language -POSS.3 HESIT learn do -AOR -1.SG
I know our language from my family because my grandmother speaks it very well.
aa sora aa bizım diljä aa büleram ävdän onučun ki bänım äbämın bänım äbäm aa yahši büler bu dili

HESIT afterwards HESIT 1.PL -GEN language -LOC HESIT know -IPFV -1.SG house -ABL because that 1.SG -GEN grandmother -POSS.1.SG -GEN 1.SG -GEN grandmother -POSS.1.SG HESIT good know -AOR this language -POSS.3
I speak only Urum with her.
aa onnar bir bu dilınän söileram
But for me it’s not the big difference between Russian and Urum.
aa hama bä bäna böyük raznitsa dägıl urus dili ke urum dildır
HESIT but HESIT 1.SG -DAT big difference NOM.NEG Russian language -POSS.3 HESIT Urum language -EPST.COP
Because I know Russian and Urum very well.
onučun ki mm bän bu dili ee i urus dili yahši büleram
because that HESIT 1.SG this language -ACC HESIT and Russian language -POSS.3 good know -AOR -1.SG
And with all our people we speak Urum language.
aa i häpınan bizım halhınan söilerıh bu dildä
HESIT and all -INSTR 1.PL -GEN people -INSTR speak -AOR -1.PL this language -LOC
